# Great Binary

## Source

```c
01001000 01100001 01100011 01101011 01000011 01010100 01000110 01111011 01100011 01110010 01111001 01110000 01110100 01101111 01011111 01110110 00110010 01110010 01111001 01011111 01100101 01100001 01110011 01111001 01011111 01110000 01110010 00110000 01100010 00110001 01100101 01101101 01111101
```

## Solve

단순한 바이너리 코드를 아스키로 만들면 플래그가 나온다.

```python
binary = "01001000 01100001 01100011 01101011 01000011 01010100 01000110 01111011 01100011 01110010 01111001 01110000 01110100 01101111 01011111 01110110 00110010 01110010 01111001 01011111 01100101 01100001 01110011 01111001 01011111 01110000 01110010 00110000 01100010 00110001 01100101 01101101 01111101".replace(" ", "")
numbers = [int(binary[i:i+8], 2) for i in range(0, len(binary), 8)]
data = []
for i in numbers:
	data.append(chr(i))
print "".join(data)
```
